title: Self-Regulated Expert Learning Competency Development Course in Knowledge-Intensive Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational learning design skills and experience with self-regulated learning
context.additional_context: Emphasis on practical problem-solving skills in social domains within BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments

learning_goals: Learners can establish self-regulated learning plans by applying the 4Cs framework (Consuming, Creating, Connecting, Contributing)
Learners can perform knowledge connection (Connecting) and sharing (Contributing) activities with peers using online collaboration tools at least three times
Learners can produce at least two reusable knowledge artifacts (Creating) using learning design tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
